title: Event Recommendation for Social Engagement
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest local events and activities based on my interests so that I can stay socially connected and continue to engage with my community despite my limited mobility.

title: Social Engagement Notifications
summary: As an older adult, I want to receive notifications about local events and social activities that align with my interests so that I can stay connected and engaged with my community despite my limited mobility.

title: Family and Caregiver Communication Support
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily communicate with my family and caregivers using voice commands so that I can stay connected and share updates about my well-being without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: User-Friendly Event Scheduling
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to help me schedule volunteering activities and social events easily through voice commands, so that I can maintain my social connections and stay active without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Virtual Social Activity Integration
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to recommend local social activities and events based on my interests so that I can stay socially connected and engaged despite my limited mobility.

title: Personalized Event Suggestions
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to recommend local social events based on my interests so that I can stay engaged and connected with my community.

title: Feedback Mechanism for Social Activities
summary: As an older adult, I want to provide feedback on social activities suggested by ALFRED so that I can help improve future recommendations and ensure they align with my interests and capabilities.

title: Support for Group Communication
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily initiate group calls or messages with my family and friends using voice commands so that I can stay socially connected and involved in group activities without struggling with technology.

title: Interest-Based Community Recommendations
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest local events and activities based on my interests, so that I can stay socially connected and engaged despite my limited mobility.
